properties.Name: Simunye Support Group
properties.Activity: Sabona has established the Simunye Support Group aimed at empowering members of the community living with HIV by providing them with the tools and resources to generate their own income through poultry rearing. This initiative not only fosters self-sufficiency but also enables participants to cover essential expenses such as food and medication. By promoting sustainable livelihoods, Sabona is helping to create a supportive environment where individuals can thrive and improve their quality of life.
